title: Hua Jiang Hu Zhi Bu Liang Ren
alternative_title: Painting Rivers and Lakes, A PORTRAIT OF JIANGHU : BAD GUYS, 画江湖之不良人
description: Two martial artists are brutally killed by a team of assassins, leaving their wards, a young boy and girl, defenseless. A martial arts master dispatches of the assassins, sparing their lives, and decides to take them in. He raises them and teaches them martial arts.
